name: Shree Shree Anandamayee Kanyapeeth
description: A residential school for girls providing modern education along with spiritual training and character development. Founded under Maa's inspiration to nurture young minds in both worldly and spiritual knowledge.

name: Shree Shree Anandamayee Sangha Hospital
description: Charitable hospital providing medical care to devotees and the local community. Offers both allopathic and ayurvedic treatments with special focus on serving the underprivileged.

name: Shree Shree Anandamayee Vidyapeeth
description: Educational institution dedicated to traditional Vedic learning and Sanskrit studies. Preserving ancient knowledge while making it accessible to modern students.

name: Anandamayee Charitable Dispensary
description: Free medical dispensary providing healthcare services to the poor and needy. Run entirely on donations and staffed by volunteer doctors and nurses.

name: Shree Shree Anandamayee Balika Vidyalaya
description: Primary and secondary school for girls from economically disadvantaged backgrounds. Provides free education, books, uniforms, and midday meals.

name: Anandamayee Trust
description: Main administrative trust managing all properties and institutions of the Sangha. Coordinates activities across all centers and ensures proper maintenance of ashrams.
